short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and easily download images from web pages with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension provides users with an easy and efficient way to download images from any web page. With our extension installed, users can quickly download images from any website with just one click.

Our extension automatically detects images on the page and allows users to select which images they want to download. Once selected, images are downloaded directly to the userâ€™s computer, allowing them to access them quickly and easily.

Our extension is designed for a user-friendly experience, allowing users to quickly and easily download images with minimal effort.
